author: atirut-w
body:
One dependency installable(liblttng-ust0) and one not installable(libicu57)
Any fix?

comments.author: rjmholt
comments.body:
Hi @WattanaGaming, would you be able to give some details about the OS/platform you're running?

Maybe the output of:
```
cat /etc/os-release
```
and
```
uname -a
```

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
>not installable(libicu57

It is Mint community issue - we can not compile and distribute the library.
Mint community should ask .Net Core team to add support.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as external and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been be closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Can't install on Linux mint
